sentences.sContent: If you are twentieth, do you get a medal?
sentences.sContent_eng: If you are twentieth, do you get a medal?
sentences.sCn: 如果你第二十，你得到奖牌吗？

sentences.sContent: Tutti was always first in her class before, but has slipped since the last move down to twentieth out of fifty children.
sentences.sContent_eng: Tutti was always first in her class before, but has slipped since the last move down to twentieth out of fifty children.
sentences.sCn: 图蒂从前在班上总是名列前茅，但打从上回搬家后，名次已掉到五十个学童当中的第二十名。

synos.tran: 第二十的；二十分之一的

words.tran: 二十几岁；二十年代（1920年到1929年的时期）；一生中20至29岁的十年
